entry.title: Yorutia's Tank Doram Guide
entry.summary:
remove outdated warning

← Older revision Revision as of 00:31, 27 June 2023
Line 1: Line 1:
__FORCETOC__
__FORCETOC__
<p style="background-color: AntiqueWhite; color: #000000; border-radius: 7px; padding: 12px;"> '''This guide does not include Spirit Handler's (4th job) skills. I ''might'' eventually update the guide. But for the most part, builds here will be still relevant. Except for if you want spammable AoE healing as support, that is, for which go check out [[Ced%27s_Physical_and_Support_Spirit_Handler_Guide#Support_and_Healer_Swap_Gears_Build|Ced's build]].''' </p>

entry.title: Ranger Guide by Hurt Locker - NovaRO

| style="background:#EBEBFF;text-align:center"| The good set for AB today, recommended for party, for a balanced damage-stamina setup. Providing a lot of aspd, hp, damage, +20 all stats is much appreciated for a hard to balance build. If you want to have a little more damage on the "cheap" basis and not use the Aimed Bolt Set, you can use the {{Item List2|id=24150|item= +7 or +9 Infinity Shadow Ring|link=1}} and {{Item List2|id=24151|item= +7 or +9 Infinity Shadow Bracer|link=1}} It helps a lot in increasing the damage too (NOT recommended if you are going to be in the company of a Mechanic; it would not make sense to do this SG for SizePenalty if you are going to receive the same buff for free, for that use another Shadow Gears Rings and Bracer). I recommend this SG for [[Ranger_Guide_by_Hurt_Locker_-_NovaRO#Special_Build:Tank-DPS_Aimed_Bolt|'''here, Build AB DPS-Tank''']].
| style="background:#EBEBFF;text-align:center"| The good set for AB today, recommended for party, for a balanced damage-stamina setup. Providing a lot of aspd, hp, damage, +20 all stats is much appreciated for a hard to balance build. If you want to have a little more damage on the "cheap" basis and not use the Aimed Bolt Set, you can use the {{Item List2|id=24150|item= +7 or +9 Infinity Shadow Ring|link=1}} and {{Item List2|id=24151|item= +7 or +9 Infinity Shadow Bracer|link=1}} It helps a lot in increasing the damage too (NOT recommended if you are going to be in the company of a Mechanic; it would not make sense to do this SG for SizePenalty if you are going to receive the same buff for free, for that use another Shadow Gears Rings and Bracer). I recommend this SG for [[Ranger_Guide_by_Hurt_Locker_-_NovaRO#Special_Build:Tank-DPS|'''here, Build AB DPS-Tank''']].

entry.title: Airship Crash
entry.summary:
category and minor edits

← Older revision Revision as of 13:57, 24 June 2023
Line 4: Line 4:
Unlike regular instance, this one can be considered as a dungeon on NovaRO.
Unlike regular instance, this one can be considered as a dungeon on NovaRO.
The purpose of this instance is to obtain {{Item List2|id=1000364|item=Ymir Ore}} (from killing monsters inside the cave) and {{Item List2|id=1000363|item=Ymir Fragment}} (from turning in quests).
The purpose of this instance is to obtain {{Item List2|id=1000364|item=Ymir Ore}} (from killing monsters inside the cave) and {{Item List2|id=1000363|item=Ymir Fragment}} (from turning in quests).
Certain amounts of {{Item List2|id=1000363|item=Ymir Fragments}} can be exchanged either for spawning one of 4 variants of the instance MVP, or it can be exchanged for <b>Unknown Stat Boots</b>, enchantment catalyst and a card album containing only cards from monsters from this instance (including the MVP boss cards!).
{{Item List2|id=1000364|item=Ymir Ores}} can be used to [[Item_Reform#Thanos_Recipes|reform]] Thanatos weapons into Thanos weapons-AD.
{{Item List2|id=1000363|item=Ymir Fragments}} can be exchanged either for spawning one of the 4 variants of the instance MVP, or for <b>Unknown Stat Boots</b>, enchantment catalyst and a card album containing only cards from monsters from this instance (including the MVP boss cards!).


== Access ==
== Access ==
Line 231: Line 232:
|Variable Cast Time - 1% ~ 10%
|Variable Cast Time - 1% ~ 10%
|}
|}
[[Category:Item Reform]]

entry.title: Item Reform
entry.summary:
consistent names with in-game displays

← Older revision Revision as of 13:05, 24 June 2023
(One intermediate revision by the same user not shown)
Line 1: Line 1:
[[File:Reform-npc-mei.png|thumb|right]]
[[File:Reform-npc-mei.png|thumb|right]]
Item reform describes the process of converting certain weapons / armors into their corresponding lv5 / lv2 versions (usually superior) respectively (see also: [[Refinement System]]). This process only works for a limited list of gear (see [[#item-reform-recipes|recipes]]). Beware that the list of required materials is customized on NovaRO.
Item reform describes the process of converting certain weapons / armors into their corresponding lv5 / lv2 versions (usually superior) respectively (see also: [[Refinement System]]). This process only works for a limited list of gear (see [[#Item Recipes|recipes]]). Beware that the list of required materials is customized on NovaRO.


Upon reforming the item, all enchants are lost and the refinement is lowered depending on the used recipe. <b>Any cards need to be removed before reforming.</b>
Upon reforming the item, all enchants are lost and the refinement is lowered depending on the used recipe. <b>Any cards need to be removed before reforming.</b>
Line 7: Line 7:
<div style="clear: both"></div>
<div style="clear: both"></div>

<h1 id="item-reform-hammers">Refining Reformed Items</h1>
=Refining Reformed Items=
Reformed items offer additional, guaranteed methods of increasing the refinement level by one. The success-rate is always 100%, there is no chance of breaking, damaging, or not advancing the refinement level.
Reformed items offer additional, guaranteed methods of increasing the refinement level by one. The success-rate is always 100%, there is no chance of breaking, damaging, or not advancing the refinement level.

==OSAD Weapons==
==OSAD Weapons==
They can be reformed from OS Weapons from +7 and above with 200 {{Item List nro|id=20922|item=Heart Hunter Medals}}, 200 {{Item List nro|id=25669|item=Unknown Parts}} and 40 {{Item List nro|id=25723|item=Cor Cores}} at Blaze Starfire in
They can be reformed from OS Weapons from +7 and above with 200 {{Item List nro|id=20922|item=Heart Hunter Medals}}, 200 {{Item List nro|id=25669|item=Unknown Parts}} and 40 {{Item List nro|id=25723|item=Cor Cores}} at Blaze Starfire in
{{NaviLink|map=sp_cor,|x=97|y=106}}. Do note that there's no refinement penalty when reforming OS weapons into OSAD weapons. For example, if it's a +15 weapon, then the OSAD weapon will be +15 as well.
{{NaviLink|map=sp_cor,|x=97|y=106}}. Do note that there's no refinement penalty when reforming OS weapons into OSAD weapons however, the enchants from OS base weapons would be removed. For example, if it's a +15 weapon, then the OSAD weapon will be +15 as well.

entry.title: Rudus Past
entry.summary:
Launched

New page

Rudus Past is a custom dungeon map based on [[Illusion]] Episode. To access it, talk to Oscar at {{NaviLink|map=sp_cor,|x=96|y=110}}.
==Rudus Past Enemies==
All can drop {{Item List nro|id=20922|item=Heart Hunter Medal}} at 10% and {{Item List nro|id=35557|item=OS Weapon Box}} at 3%. Both of these drops doesn't affected by Bubble Gum.

UNDER CONSTRUCTION

==OSAD Weapons==
They can be reformed from OS Weapons from +7 and above with 200 {{Item List nro|id=20922|item=Heart Hunter Medals}}, 200 {{Item List nro|id=25669|item=Unknown Parts}} and 40 {{Item List nro|id=25723|item=Cor Cores}} at Blaze Starfire in
{{NaviLink|map=sp_cor,|x=97|y=106}}. Do note that there's no refinement penalty when reforming OS weapons into OSAD weapons. For example, if it's a +15 weapon, then the OSAD weapon will be +15 as well.

:If refine rate is 9 or higher, increases {{Skill List|id=19|skill=Fireball}} and {{Skill List|id=17|skill=Fireball}} damage by 60%.

==OSAD Weapon Enchants==
OSAD weapons can be enchanted at Blaze Starfire in {{NaviLink|map=sp_cor,|x=97|y=106}}. All of these enchants are perfect enchants which means you can pick which enchants you desired. Both slots can be upgraded till level 5. Resetting cost 500,000 zenies. All of these procedures are 100% safe rate and will not fail.

Enchanting 3rd slot cost: 150 {{Item List nro|id=25669|item=Unknown Parts}}, 25 {{Item List nro|id=20922|item=Heart Hunter Medals}} and 100,000 zenies. <br>
Enchanting 2nd slot cost: 100 {{Item List nro|id=25669|item=Unknown Parts}}, 75 {{Item List nro|id=25723|item=Cor Cores}}, 25 {{Item List nro|id=20922|item=Heart Hunter Medals}}, and 100,000 zenies.

Upgrades on both slots cost:
:1st upgrade: 50 {{Item List nro|id=20922|item=Heart Hunter Medals}} and 200,000 zenies.
:2nd upgrade: 100 {{Item List nro|id=20922|item=Heart Hunter Medals}} and 200,000 zenies.
:3rd upgrade: 150 {{Item List nro|id=20922|item=Heart Hunter Medals}} and 200,000 zenies.
:4th upgrade: 200 {{Item List nro|id=20922|item=Heart Hunter Medals}} and 200,000 zenies.

===Enchant Pool===

==OSAD Hat-LT Combos==
They can be reformed by having +9 of those hats with Blaze Starfire in {{NaviLink|map=sp_cor,|x=97|y=106}}. It costs 800 {{Item List nro|id=20922|item=Heart Hunter Medals}}, 100 {{Item List nro|id=25669|item=Unknown Parts}} and 20 {{Item List nro|id=25723|item=Cor Cores}}. Do note however that reforming them will have their refine bonus reduce by 5.

{| class="wikitable mw-collapsible" style="text-align: center; margin:auto; width: 90%"
! style="background-color:#B6D4D9; width: 75px;" | Image

:Atk + 20 per 2 refine rate.
:If refine rate is 7 or higher, reduces variable casting time by 15%.
:If refine rate is 9 or higher, increase long ranged physical damage by 20%.
:If refine rate is 10 or higher, increases physical damage against small and medium size enemies by 20%, reduces fixed casting time by 0.2 seconds.
:---------------------------------
:When equipped with {{Item List nro|id=560034|item=Burning Knuckle-OSAD|slots=2}}, reduces cooldown of Rampage Blast by 1 second,
:increases long ranged physical damage by 4% per 2 refine rate of weapon.

:increases Cart Cannon damage by 5% per 2 refine rate of weapon.

:When equipped with {{Item List nro|id=700054|item=Virtual Bow-OSAD|slots=2}}, reduces cooldown of Arrow Storm by 2.5 seconds,
:increases Focused Arrow Strike damage by 5% per 2 refine rate of weapon.
:---------------------------------
:When equipped with {{Item List nro|id=620018|item=Blasti-OSAD|slots=2}}, Atk + 70,
:increases Arm Cannon damage by 5% per 2 refine rate of weapon.
:Class: Headgear
:Armor level: 2
:Required level: 170
:Usable Jobs: Every Job
|-
|{{Illust|id=400267}}
|{{Item |id=400267 Red Clock Casquette-LT <nowiki>[1]</nowiki>}}
|
:Atk + 20 per 2 refine rate.
:If refine rate is 7 or higher, reduces variable casting time by 15%.
:If refine rate is 9 or higher, increase melee and long ranged physical damage by 20%.
:If refine rate is 10 or higher, increases physical damage against small and medium size enemies by 20%, reduces fixed casting time by 0.2 seconds.
:---------------------------------
:When equipped with {{Item List nro|id=610039|item=Meuchler-OSAD|slots=2}}, Atk + 70,
:increases Rolling Cutter damage by 7% per 2 refine rate of weapon.
:---------------------------------
:When equipped with {{Item List nro|id=540051|item=Circuit Board-OSAD|slots=2}}, Atk + 70,
:increases Solar Burst damage by 7% per 2 refine rate of weapon.
:---------------------------------
:When equipped with {{Item List nro|id=600028|item=Beam Claymore-OSAD|slots=2}}, reduces cooldown of Ignition Break by 1 second,
:increases Ignition Break damage by 7% per 2 refine rate of weapon.
:Class: Headgear
:Armor level: 2
:Required level: 170
:Usable Jobs: Every Job
|-
|}
